name: part_013
file: tmp_【#癒月ちょこ3周年】３周年記念3D配信⚡重大告知あり！【ホロライブ⧸癒月ちょこ】 [spHKQDaz0C0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Yuzuki Choco performs her original song 'Choco Love' on a 3D stage with heart-themed visuals.
MC section where Choco-sensei talks to the audience and makes a major announcement.

subtitles.original: 疲れてる顔して　いつもたくさん頑張ってるね
subtitles.english: You look tired, you're always working so hard.

subtitles.original: もう全て任せて　全部食べてあげようか
subtitles.english: Just leave it all to me, shall I eat it all up for you?

subtitles.original: よそ見なんて嫌だよ　ちゃんとこっち向いていなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I don't like you looking away, you've got to face me.

subtitles.original: 目と目が合うでしょう　照れちゃうくらい見つめてね
subtitles.english: Our eyes will meet, right? Stare at me until it's embarrassing.

subtitles.original: ひとつ　夢中にさせて
subtitles.english: One: make you obsessed.

subtitles.original: ふたつ　見つけてね
subtitles.english: Two: find me.

subtitles.original: もう一個　虜にしちゃうの　心拍急上昇
subtitles.english: And one more: I'll captivate you, heart rate rising fast.

subtitles.original: 好きだよ
subtitles.english: I love you.

subtitles.original: 痛いの痛いの飛んでけ　不安な顔より笑顔見せて
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away! Show me a smile instead of that anxious face.

subtitles.original: めちゃ好きでいて受け止めて　甘いチョコのような時を
subtitles.english: Love me lots and embrace this time, sweet like chocolate.

subtitles.original: どこ痛いの痛いのも変わっちゃう　不意打ちにちょこっとときめく
subtitles.english: The "where does it hurt" changes, a sudden little heart-flutter.

subtitles.original: 焦らしちゃうわよだめ　もう少し君の声をもっと聴かせて
subtitles.english: I'll keep teasing you, no, let me hear your voice a little more.

subtitles.original: 不安なんて抱えて　らしくないなんて思ってた
subtitles.english: Carrying anxiety around... I thought it wasn't like you.

subtitles.original: 全部全部丸ごと　包み込んで溶かしてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll wrap it all up and melt it away for you.

subtitles.original: どうしたって何したって　気持ちは同じなんだね
subtitles.english: No matter what, no matter what we do, our feelings are the same.

subtitles.original: ここだってどこだって　思いは伝わるから
subtitles.english: Whether here or anywhere, my feelings will reach you.

subtitles.original: 声にして文字にして　言ったって聞いてたいでよ
subtitles.english: Put it in words, put it in writing, I want to keep hearing you say it.

subtitles.original: 今日だっていつだって　愛してるの
subtitles.english: Today and always, I love you.

subtitles.original: 隠さないでちゃんと教えて　君のこと全部を
subtitles.english: Don't hide anything, tell me everything about you.

subtitles.original: 頂戴
subtitles.english: Give it to me.

subtitles.original: 痛いの痛いの飛んでけ　少しだけマジにお願い
subtitles.english: Pain, pain, go away! I'm asking you seriously.

subtitles.original: 高まる心聴いてみて　感じてほしいの
subtitles.english: Listen to my racing heart, I want you to feel it.

subtitles.original: 会いたいわすぐ飛んでけ　すごいまじに惚れたり
subtitles.english: I want to see you, fly to me now, falling for you so seriously.

subtitles.original: めちゃ好きでいて受け止めて　甘く蕩けちゃうような時を
subtitles.english: Love me lots and embrace this time, sweet and melting away.

subtitles.original: 隣にいたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to be by your side.

subtitles.original: はい、ということでー
subtitles.english: All right, so...

subtitles.original: 皆様！ちょこからの3周年のプレゼントはー
subtitles.english: Everyone! Choco's 3rd anniversary present is...

subtitles.original: メン限でね、前話した時に
subtitles.english: In the members-only stream, we talked about how...

subtitles.original: ちょこのオリ曲みんなが聴いてみたいって言ってたからー
subtitles.english: ...you all wanted to hear an original song from me.

subtitles.original: 3周年のプレゼントはー
subtitles.english: My 3rd anniversary present is...

subtitles.original: ちょこのオリ曲、Choco Loveでしたー！
subtitles.english: My original song, "Choco Love"!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでねー
subtitles.english: Yes, so...

subtitles.original: こちらのChoco Love、ジャンキー先生書き下ろし楽曲でございます！
subtitles.english: This song, Choco Love, was written by Junky-sensei!

subtitles.original: そして！重大発表その1！
subtitles.english: And! Major announcement number one!

subtitles.original: このオリ曲、Choco Love...
subtitles.english: This original song, Choco Love...

subtitles.original: 本日0時、24時からー
subtitles.english: Starting today at midnight, at 24:00...

subtitles.original: 配信開始されます！いえーい！
subtitles.english: It will be available for distribution! Yay!
